original_text:
A brother offended is more unyielding than a strong city,
    and quarreling is like the bars of a castle.
korean_text: 노엽게 한 형제와 화목하기가 견고한 성을 취하기보다 어려운즉 이러한 다툼은 산성 문빗장 같으니라

sentences.original_text: A brother offended is more unyielding than a strong city
sentences.korean_translation: 마음 상한 형제는 견고한 성읍보다 더 완고하니라

sentences.original_text: and quarreling is like the bars of a castle.
